Sylvia

messages.subject: naruto flash animation
messages.msgSnippet: hi my son adli has been into these for about a year, he creates his own pretty easily by using macromedia s flash 8 ( he uses professional). thia program is
messages.messageBody:
hi
my son adli has been into these for about a year, he creates his own
pretty easily by using macromedia's flash 8 ( he uses professional).
thia program is available for a free 30 day trial from macromedia ,com
( go to downloads then trial downloads then flash 9)or downloads.com.
there are pretty good free tutorials for preteen/ teen kids on the
program at kidzonline.org ( go to 2-d animation then stream the lesson,
there are 10, so expand at bottom for rest) it is really fun , I run 2
free in home unschooling computer animation groups, I'm near philly if
by chance your nearby.
write me if you need more info / help
patrick
